message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't let this go for less than $13,000. This is already a very competitive price for what the product offers.
Alice,  I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?  I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
